TopicTitle: Flags don’t appear in tracking station objects

Articles.Content:
Placed a flag on the Mun arch and it doesn’t show up in the tracking station even with all filters active. The Mun does have a drop-down arrow which indicates that there is other stuff on the Mun, but clicking that doesn’t do anything. I have nothing else on the Mun at the moment, and haven’t tried this on any other planet/moon.

 KSP2 version: 1.0 (or release, whichever is higher)

Windows 10

CPU: 5600x

GPU: RTX 3060 OC 12GB

Edited February 27, 2023 by Youre_Arent
Added specs

Same here. Placed flag on mun - look into tracking station - nothing to see there - look back to my Kerbal on Mun - Flag is still there. Seems to me its a bug in the tracking station. Someone should have tested and fixed this before release....

Edited February 27, 2023 by KnutG
Yeah, this would be nice to see working. Though at the moment almost nothing inside of the tracking station works. Can't rename vessels, can't destroy debris, can't see flags....

It may be more complicated - I think think flags are persistent at all.  I planted a flag at a Munarch and then launched the lander to return. I later came back to the same Munarch with a second lander and the original flag was entirely gone, not just from the Tracking Station.
